summary: The records package implements the low‑level import pipeline for Open Library. It coordinates matcher functions that search the data stores for existing bibliographic keys, filters out weak matches, and formats the results for the higher‑level search layer. It also supplies utilities to translate between external document formats (authors, editions, works) and the internal data structures, and to locate records by identifiers or title information.
business_intent: Enable fast, accurate detection of duplicate or related bibliographic entries during data import, allowing the system to link new submissions to existing authors, editions, and works and maintain a clean, searchable catalog.
